feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and quotation marks consistently.

feature2.explanation: Similar word choice and grammar structures observed in both texts.

feature3.explanation: Both texts display coherence and cohesion in their structure and arrangement.

feature4.explanation: Distinctive tone and mood differences but some common expressions seen.

feature5.explanation: No noticeable spelling or typographical errors in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation, lexical and grammatical features, and coherence in structure, with some differences in tone and mood, the likelihood of the same author is moderate.
